form.label: Similar IP Lookup
form.description: Allows for an analyst to query the GreyNoise IP Similarity tool for internet scanning IPs that have similar attributes to the one submitted. Requires an IP Similarity license to function.

search.query: $token_search_trigger$ | gnipsimilar [| makeresults | eval ip_address = if(isnull("$tkn_ip_address_escaped$") OR "$tkn_ip_address_escaped$"=="", "", "$tkn_ip_address_escaped$") | eval min_score = if(isnull("$tkn_min_score_escaped$") OR "$tkn_min_score_escaped$"=="", "90", "$tkn_min_score_escaped$") | eval limit = if(isnull("$tkn_limit_escaped$") OR "$tkn_limit_escaped$"=="", "90", "$tkn_limit_escaped$") | eval ip_address = ip_address | eval min_score = min_score | eval limit = limit | return ip_address min_score limit ] | eval score = tostring(round(score * 100,2)) + "%" | table ip score classification actor organization country last_seen features | rename ip AS "IP Address" score AS "Score" classification AS "Classification" actor AS "Actor" organization AS "Organization" country AS "Source Country" last_seen AS "Last Seen" features AS "Similarity Features"

condition.set: GreyNoise has not observed any recent activity with the provided parameters
No results were returned due to improper values in the parameters
